an10.93:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an10.93:1.2: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati diva divassa savatthiya nikkhami bhagavantam dassanaya.
an10.93:1.8: Yannunaham yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam aramo tenupasankameyyan”ti.
an10.93:2.1: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam aramo tenupasankami.
an10.93:2.2: Tena kho pana samayena annatitthiya paribbajaka sangamma samagamma unnadino uccasaddamahasadda anekavihitam tiracchanakatham kathenta nisinna honti.
an10.93:2.3: Addasamsu kho te annatitthiya paribbajaka anathapindikam gahapatim duratova agacchantam.
an10.93:2.6: Ayam anathapindiko gahapati aramam agacchati samanassa gotamassa savako.
an10.93:2.7: Yavata kho pana samanassa gotamassa savaka gihi odatavasana savatthiyam pativasanti, ayam tesam annataro anathapindiko gahapati.
an10.93:2.8: Appasaddakama kho pana te ayasmanto appasaddavinita appasaddassa vannavadino.
an10.93:2.9: Appeva nama appasaddam parisam viditva upasankamitabbam manneyya”ti.
an10.93:3.1: Atha kho te annatitthiya paribbajaka tunhi ahesum.
an10.93:3.2: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati yena te annatitthiya paribbajaka tenupasankami; upasankamitva tehi annatitthiyehi paribbajakehi saddhim sammodi.
an10.93:3.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho anathapindikam gahapatim te annatitthiya paribbajaka etadavocum:
an10.93:3.5: “Na kho aham, bhante, bhagavato sabbam ditthim janami”ti.
an10.93:4.1: “Iti kira tvam, gahapati, na samanassa gotamassa sabbam ditthim janasi;
an10.93:4.3: “Bhikkhunampi kho aham, bhante, na sabbam ditthim janami”ti.
an10.93:5.1: “Iti kira tvam, gahapati, na samanassa gotamassa sabbam ditthim janasi napi bhikkhunam sabbam ditthim janasi;
an10.93:5.3: “Etam kho, bhante, amhehi na dukkaram byakatum yamditthika mayam.
an10.93:5.4: Ingha tava ayasmanto yathasakani ditthigatani byakarontu, pacchapetam amhehi na dukkaram bhavissati byakatum yamditthika mayan”ti.
an10.93:6.1: Evam vutte, annataro paribbajako anathapindikam gahapatim etadavoca:
an10.93:7.1: Annataropi kho paribbajako anathapindikam gahapatim etadavoca:
an10.93:8.1: Annataropi kho paribbajako anathapindikam gahapatim etadavoca:
an10.93:8.8: hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana …
an10.93:8.9: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannanti—
an10.93:9.1: Evam vutte, anathapindiko gahapati te paribbajake etadavoca:
an10.93:9.5: imassa ayamayasmato ditthi attano va ayonisomanasikarahetu uppanna paratoghosapaccaya va.
an10.93:9.6: Sa kho panesa ditthi bhuta sankhata cetayita paticcasamuppanna.
an10.93:9.7: Yam kho pana kinci bhutam sankhatam cetayitam paticcasamuppannam tadaniccam.
an10.93:9.9: Yam dukkham tadeveso ayasma allino, tadeveso ayasma ajjhupagato.
an10.93:10.4: imassapi ayamayasmato ditthi attano va ayonisomanasikarahetu uppanna paratoghosapaccaya va.
an10.93:10.5: Sa kho panesa ditthi bhuta sankhata cetayita paticcasamuppanna.
an10.93:10.6: Yam kho pana kinci bhutam sankhatam cetayitam paticcasamuppannam tadaniccam.
an10.93:10.8: Yam dukkham tadeveso ayasma allino, tadeveso ayasma ajjhupagato.
an10.93:11.8: hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana …
an10.93:11.9: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannanti—
an10.93:11.11: imassapi ayamayasmato ditthi attano va ayonisomanasikarahetu uppanna paratoghosapaccaya va.
an10.93:11.12: Sa kho panesa ditthi bhuta sankhata cetayita paticcasamuppanna.
an10.93:11.13: Yam kho pana kinci bhutam sankhatam cetayitam paticcasamuppannam tadaniccam.
an10.93:11.15: Yam dukkham tadeveso ayasma allino, tadeveso ayasma ajjhupagato”ti.
an10.93:12.1: Evam vutte te paribbajaka anathapindikam gahapatim etadavocum:
an10.93:12.2: “byakatani kho, gahapati, amhehi sabbeheva yathasakani ditthigatani.
an10.93:12.4: “Yam kho, bhante, kinci bhutam sankhatam cetayitam paticcasamuppannam tadaniccam.
an10.93:12.6: ‘Yam dukkham tam netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti—
an10.93:13.1: “Yam kho, gahapati, kinci bhutam sankhatam cetayitam paticcasamuppannam tadaniccam.
an10.93:13.3: Yam dukkham tadeva tvam, gahapati, allino, tadeva tvam, gahapati, ajjhupagato”ti.
an10.93:14.1: “Yam kho, bhante, kinci bhutam sankhatam cetayitam paticcasamuppannam tadaniccam.
an10.93:14.3: ‘Yam dukkham tam netam mama, nesohamasmi, nameso atta’ti—evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya sudittham.
an10.93:14.4: Tassa ca uttari nissaranam yathabhutam pajanami”ti.
an10.93:15.1: Evam vutte te paribbajaka tunhibhuta mankubhuta pattakkhandha adhomukha pajjhayanta appatibhana nisidimsu.
an10.93:15.2: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati te paribbajake tunhibhute mankubhute pattakkhandhe adhomukhe pajjhayante appatibhane viditva utthayasana yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho anathapindiko gahapati yavatako ahosi tehi annatitthiyehi paribbajakehi saddhim kathasallapo tam sabbam bhagavato arocesi.
an10.93:15.4: Evam kho te, gahapati, moghapurisa kalena kalam sahadhammena suniggahitam niggahetabba”ti.
an10.93:16.1: Atha kho bhagava anathapindikam gahapatim dhammiya kathaya sandassesi samadapesi samuttejesi sampahamsesi.
an10.93:16.2: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati bhagavata dhammiya kathaya sandassito samadapito samuttejito sampahamsito utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
an10.93:17.1: Atha kho bhagava acirapakkante anathapindike gahapatimhi bhikkhu amantesi:
an10.93:17.2: “yopi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vassasatupasampanno imasmim dhammavinaye, sopi evamevam annatitthiye paribbajake sahadhammena suniggahitam nigganheyya yatha tam anathapindikena gahapatina niggahita”ti.
